title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The key is left blank in the properties file, but it contains a valid value.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set an externalized text in the chart title.
2. Verify that it is displayed correctly in the chart.
